name: plant, and that's it
description:
Get a seed, plant it, pour water on it, go sleep, do it again. 

Arrow keys to move and interact (Swipe on touch screen)

≪ 🌿 ≫

This thing was made with Môsi, I use it to do random "games" when I'm bored in my free time, sometimes I actually complete one, like this :D

Anyways, have fun (?)   -> !! Versión en español disponible para que la descargues !!
